local_intent: Perceive the bin lid, approach and align to its edge with 0.01 tolerance, then verify pose reached.
assumptions: Frame 3 depicts the approach phase with the lid visible; pose is obtainable from DetectObject.
coherence_with_global: Matches GLOBAL steps 2-4: DetectObject(bin_lid) -> ApproachAndAlign(bin_lid, 0.01, 1500) then verify before subsequent open/retreat.
